mainFeatures.title: Explore and discover all the features that

feature1.title: Easy Application Startup
feature1.description: Automatically detect if FFmpeg is installed on your PC. If not, allows you to manually search for the binary or download it and automatically configure it for immediate use

feature2.title: Editing and Fine Adjustments
feature2.description: Cut songs precisely by selecting the exact start and end. Adjust the volume and convert files to popular formats like mp3, mp4, mkv and more, all with simple adjustments

feature3.title: Comparison and Dual Playback
feature3.description: Compare the original and edited version in real time with dual player mode. Check for edits before saving

footer.title: Let's go, give it a try

options.title: Resources
options.issues: Report Issues or Propose New Features
